A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The plot itself felt like there was a checklist of things to cover and it just went down the line to do this. Because of this there were a number of holes within the plot showing themselves through jump cuts and portions of the story just missing.

Paired with this were the random moments where myself and others and the theater just looked at eachother with confusion on our faces. The comedic moments were forced and there were a number of them unnecessarily.

Visually it was stunning\, but story wise it was poor. I'd take a poor looking movie with a great story any day over what I saw in the theater.
